chara.textHome:
There's still so many things I have to learn,
but Mami's teaching me all kinds of stuff,

so I might become the kind of Magical Girl
who can help everyone out! Hopefully I'm
putting in effort in my own way...

Wait, "hopefully" isn't enough, is it?
I'm trying my best!

And, right, Mami even complimented me
on my good work earlier!
Hee hee!
Sayaka and Kyoko are my friends.

They're always arguing with each other,
but they're actually really close!
How do I come across to you right now?
Has anything about me changed?

Strange... It's like I can see everything
around me much more clearly now.

At home, my mom goes out to work
and my dad takes care of everything
around the house.

So my dad's a house-husband!
They both get along really well.
My family, my friends, other Magical Girls...
They're all really dear to me.

That's why I want to help them
whenever something happens.

If it's a Witch that's to blame,
I'll do whatever I can to take care of it!
Yay! We got to see each other again!
Everyone else is waiting for you, too.

It's always more fun when
everyone is together. Let's go!

Good morning!
Wakey-wakey, time to get up!

Me? Yeah, I slept really well.
That's why I'm so energetic now!
Makes you realize how important sleep is.
Let's eat lunch together!

Today I've got an omelette, fried chicken, 
and vegetables... Yum... This is so good!
Oh, hey... Want some fried chicken?

Kazuko-sensei looked really happy talking
about her boyfriend again today.
It seems like things are going well this time...
I really hope he is her true love.

Right!
I need to prepare for tomorrow's classes.
The teacher might call on me to answer...
But there's that show I want to watch...
It won't hurt to watch a little bit, will it?

It feels like such a short time
since I became a Magical Girl,
but so much has happened...
So many surprises.

Homura has been a very close friend ever
since we got to know each other on her
first day when she transferred to our school.
Right, Homura?

I know they're not real, but it still feels 
a bit weird fighting other Magical Girls...
Oh, I know!

I should just think of it as
practice for fighting Witches!
Mom chose these ribbons for me.

She told me, as a girl, I can't ever let anyone
underestimate me just because of how I look.
I wonder if they're too much...
Quiz time!
Should eggs be hard-boiled?
Or are they better soft-boiled?

Teacher asked us in class,
and the answer is...
Both!

I wonder what kind of person 
I'll be when I grow up...
Maybe I'll be a hard worker like Mom.
Hmm... I can't really imagine that.
My friend Hitomi gets so many love letters,
I wonder what they all say...
I wish I could read them.
It's scary when you actually fight Witches.
I just can't seem to keep my cool...

But when I think about who I'm fighting 
for, it gives me the courage to keep going.
I don't have any strengths or talents...

I'm just happy when I can
help others, like Mami.

Sayaka has been so happy since
her wish healed Kyosuke's hands.
She said that she's so proud of herself.
Homura handles her weapons so well!
I wonder where she finds all of them...
This is too much!
I can't even!
I dropped the cake Mami gave me!
I was really looking forward to eating it, too...
I have to protect everyone!
Thank goodness...it looks like we've won!
We did it! Great!
Yes! Looking good!
Phew... We made it through somehow!

I'm Madoka Kaname!
You can call me Madoka, okay?

It hasn't been too long since I became
a Magical Girl, but I'm doing my best!

Am I a bit stronger now?
Yeah, I'm sure of it!
Now I can help even more people!

Mami told me that my magic will
just get more and more powerful!

I never even held a bow before
becoming a Magical Girl.

The first time I held it I was at a total loss,
but now I'm fine! I can use it perfectly!

Isn't it cool how Homura can stop time?!
I wish I could do that.

If I could freeze an enemy still I could shoot
it with as many arrows as I wanted!
